bot.welcome: Hello, {{name}}! Welcome to Postcard Bot - an AI-powered image generation bot.
bot.balance_empty: Your balance is empty. Top up to generate images.
bot.help:
Available commands:
/start - Start
/balance - Check balance
/app - Open editor
/language - Change language
/help - This help
bot.age_required: You must confirm that you are 18 years or older to use this bot.
bot.age_confirmed: Age confirmed. You can now use all bot features.
bot.blocked: Your account is blocked. Contact support.
bot.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
bot.generation_failed: Failed to generate image. Please try again later.
